field.tooltip: The image at the top left of the checkout page. Max size is 750x90-pixel. https is highly encouraged.

field.label: Header Background Color
field.tooltip: The background color for the header of the checkout page. Case-insensitive six-character HTML hexadecimal color code in ASCII.

field.label: Authorization Honor Period (days)
field.comment: Specifies what the Authorization Honor Period is on the merchant’s PayPal account. It must mirror the setting in PayPal.

field.label: Order Valid Period (days)
field.comment: Specifies what the Order Valid Period is on the merchant’s PayPal account. It must mirror the setting in PayPal.

field.label: Number of Child Authorizations
field.comment: The default number of child authorizations in your PayPal account is 1. To do multiple authorizations please contact PayPal to request an increase.

field.label: Transfer Shipping Options
field.tooltip: If this option is enabled, customer can change shipping address and shipping method on PayPal website. In live mode works via HTTPS protocol only.
field.comment: Notice that PayPal can handle up to 10 shipping options. That is why Magento will transfer only first 10 cheapest shipping options if there are more than 10 available.

field.label: Enable PayPal Guest Checkout
field.comment: Ability for buyer to purchase without PayPal account.

field.label: Require Customer's Billing Address
field.comment: This feature needs be enabled first for the merchant account through PayPal technical support.

field.label: Billing Agreement Signup
field.comment: Whether to create a billing agreement, if there are no active billing agreements available.
field.tooltip: Merchants need to apply to PayPal for enabling billing agreements feature. Do not enable this option until PayPal confirms that billing agreements are enabled for your merchant account.
